Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: mangled heap of bloody bones and flesh
A heap of mangled and bloody bones and flesh; once a living, breathing person now reduced to a pile of carnage and blood.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: "This maimed and beheaded corpse of a donkey is a diminutive voluptuous skunk, with short, dirty rust fur, and shoulder-length red hair. Beady deep blue eyes are set above a crooked nose and a thin mouth, complete with sensual lips. Jagged nails, on dirty hands, and trim feet are also visible."
"This maimed and beheaded corpse of a donkey is a diminutive voluptuous skunk, with short, dirty rust fur, and shoulder-length red hair."
